notes: as a noun; can sound pejorative
example_sentence_english: I am looking for a wise old man.

example_sentence_italian: Ho visto un vecchio sul ponte.
example_sentence_english: I saw an old man on the bridge.
I help old men every day.
I know some very active old men.
I remember the old man's name.
I speak to the old man calmly.
I write to the old men of the neighborhood.
I take advice from the old man.
I learn from the old men of the town.
In the old man there is wisdom.
In old men I see strength.
I read a book about the old man.

example_sentence_italian: Lavoro su un progetto sui vecchi.
example_sentence_english: I am working on a project about old men.
I talk with the old man tomorrow.
I go out with the old men from the club.
